title: Live-cell luciferase assay of drug resistant cells
procedures:
1. Culture cells in 96-well plate by time point. 
  2. Equilibrate the plate to room temperature for 30 min.
  3. Prepare control wells containing medium without cells for background. 
  4. Add a volume of luciferin solution equal to the volume of cell culture medium in a well \(luciferin solution \(vol.) : cell culture medium \(vol.) = 1 : 1).
  5. Mix the contents of plate by gently shaking for 5 sec.
  6. Immediately detect the luminescence with a luminescent plate reader. Suitable measurement time is 1~10 sec depending on equipment type.
